thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing value, great location
thread.title_full: Amazing value, great location - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew C
title: Amazing value, great location
text:
I've stayed here a number of times, and while usually for business, I have stayed for pleasure and I've found few hotels that could handle both seamlessly. Often for work I have to take the RER, and it is a short walk to Gare du Nord. For free time, it's an even shorter walk to Galleries Lafayette, Opera, and from there it's simple to hit all the top tourist spots. Easy access to the subway, and the hotel itself is a nice, quiet oasis. Also, if you're in a pinch, you can eat there, or across the way is La Pointe Drouot, which is very good. Skip the General, much like his car insurance, it is suspect.
Room Tip: In my recollection, there are no views to speak of, so a lower floor can help you skip the elevator. See more room tips
